document.heading: Motor Vehicle Services Fees and Driver Education Support Act of 1982

history.narrative: Law 4-97, the “Motor Vehicle Services Fees and Driver Education Support Act of 1982,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-337, which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Environmental Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 12, 1982, and January 26, 1982, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 9, 1982, it was assigned Act No. 4-155 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
